# lofi.co

This project is no longer being developed on GitHub.

Development has moved to [Radicle](https://radicle.xyz/). As a result, issues can no longer be created on GitHub. However, pull requests are still accepted.

To view existing issues and patches with your web browser, navigate to [code.vexcited.com](https://code.vexcited.com/nodes/seed.vexcited.com/rad:z7c1eBhqpXpJH7hmm85kwQ46uncb).

To contribute issues and patches, please consider installing Radicle and follow their [guides](https://radicle.xyz/guides/user).
